MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL23 postcode area of Bala, affecting properties in Bethel and surrounding areas. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8:30PM due to a fault on the overhead line network. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 10:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:10PM on 13th March 2021.
